test_commands: bash -lc "cd claude-multi-agent/extensions/api/rest && if [ -f package-lock.json ] || [ -f pnpm-lock.yaml ] || [ -f yarn.lock ] || [ -d node_modules ]; then npm audit --omit=dev; else echo 'skip audit: extensions/api/rest (no lockfile)'; fi"

optional_test_commands: bash -lc "cd claude-multi-agent/option-c-orchestrator && source .venv/bin/activate && pytest --cov --cov-report=html:artifacts/coverage --cov-report=xml && echo 'Coverage report: artifacts/coverage/index.html'"
bash -lc "cd claude-multi-agent/option-b-mcp-broker && npm run test:coverage && echo 'Coverage report: coverage/lcov-report/index.html'"
